title: Top lane keeps feeding
body:
I have this terrible feeling I'm becoming slowly more and more toxic. Every single game I go each and every single time. My top lane will feed. Now hold on it's not what you think. It's more of 60% of my top laners feed but there's my toxicity building in the first paragraph.

It will start in lobby all 6 bans are good and he wants to do garen in ranked, we ask nicely please play someone with more cc for us. An actual response "F**k you." Okay so maybe he'll afk or dodge I can 4v5 or wait for a new team. We get into game and he dies to fiora for first blood, now it wasnt a troll death he tried to fight her ended up taking 2 tower shots because she baited him. TBH I think her W is retarded but he died. We told him "Please play safe shyv will gank after lv 4" The response he had is unknown to me since I muted him 1 milisecond in the game. But my team just sighed as he started feeding her intentionally. Long story cut short. I can't carry is top feeds and he went 2/15. Now I have to sacrifice the only role I truly love which is JG and go main top lane. I really love league, while there are characters who annoy me I love this game the community is terrible but when I have 4 friends in ranked it's the best time, only when we get that 1 trolling top laner every 6/10 games making it very difficult to climb.

After the game we looked up the garen and he frequently does this. A huge portion of his games are him feeding and being either carried or losing, idk how he's allowed in ranked this seems very unfair.

tl;dr anyone know a good top lane champ to play? leaning towards jayce

replies.body: Yeah, you shouldn't have the mentality that you "need" to play a role because people keep feeding in games you're in. Even if you do swap roles, what's to say you won't get stuck with someone feeding in your original spot? Best thing you can do is just report those people/move on. Eventually they'll get suspended or banned thus thinning the herd of filth.

Eventually they'll get suspended or banned thus thinning the herd of filth.

Yeah you shouldnt have the idea that you need to take a roll. I started just taking top, even the games where I don't get it. And guess what, I win each and every one of those games. Fuck being nice toxicity wins games
I believe [this video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iJUHO_r388k) will assist you quite a bit on your mid-league-crisis.

Try shen, he's not that hard to play and can have a lot of impact on the game. Just build full tank. If you need damage titanic hydra, frozen mallet, or maybe wits end. Play passive in lane and use your ult to try to help other lanes. Generally don't fight in lane unless you have the advantage from earlier kills, them tanking tower, or a gank because you're damage isn't very good. Jayce and wukong are also good choices if you want to be more aggressive.
That or play jungle and trust in statistics.

Play enough games and it should average out a bit. You will get the Fiora on your team half the time and the Garen the other half. All you can do is try your best and accept that you can't choose your teammates.
